item.title: Getting started with chef
item.description: Contributing to the Documentation # We request that the Chef community not use this StackOverflow documentation feature. Docs managed via wiki (or community editing in general) tend to rot very quickly and are of poor quality. We’ve all experienced the sense of dread when searching for an answer on Google and getting back a half-unreadable wiki page from two years ago. The Chef documentation is managed in GitHub in the chef-web-docs project.

item.title: The Chef documentation can be found at httpsdocs.chef.io
item.description: The Chef documentation can be found at https://docs.chef.io/ # The Chef documentation can be found at https://docs.chef.io/
